description: Our top stories today: U.S. yield surge puts investors on edge; Russia, Saudi Arabia quietly agree to oil output increase after Trump criticism; and Amazon workers may be worse off after wage hike. Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
